mapper.select: SELECT a.employment_id, a.company_id, a.employee_id, a.employ_date, a.open_af_date, a.handle_type, b.storage_date, b.yuliu_doc_num, b.doc_num, b.archive_place, b.archive_place_additional, b.archive_card_state, b.doc_code, b.diaodang_feedback, t.out_reason, t.out_date, c.* from am_resign c LEFT JOIN am_employment a on c.employment_id = a.employment_id LEFT JOIN am_archive b on a.employment_id = a.employment_id LEFT JOIN am_emp_task t on t.company_id = c.company_id and c.employee_id =t.employee_id where c.company_id = #{companyId} and c.employee_id = #{employeeId}
